title: Eye on the Pirates: Equipment Mgr. Brian Godin
text:

Brian Godin   wlbz2.com: http://on.wlbz2.com/1RUIV45   Join the Conversation To   Eye on the Pirates: Equipment Mgr. Brian Godin Eye on the Pirates: Brian Godin Johnny Mehler, WCSH 6:45 p.m. EDT October 20, 2015 Eye on the Pirates: Brian Godin (Photo: NEWS CENTER) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
PORTLAND, Maine 
(NEWS CENTER) -- When the Portland Pirates switched their NHL affiliate a lot changed from front office people to the players on the roster. 
Almost all of the guys wearing the Pirates sweaters are new to Portland, so to keep you up to speed with the team we're bringing back our weekly "Eye on the Pirates" segment. 
This week, NEWS CENTER's Johnny Mehler introduces us to the man responsible for making sure the players look good, while providing them with the proper equipment that allows them to play even better. Read or Share this story: http://on.wlbz2.com/1RUIV45 TOP VIDEOS
